title: David Cronenberg Reportedly Passed On Making ‘True Detective’ Season Two Completely Awesome
text:
David Cronenberg Reportedly Passed On Making ‘True Detective’ Season Two Completely Awesome 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
So True Detective season two has come, disappointed many, and gone down a dusty path of hard-boiled dialogue and odd Friends -loving ginger ...
